feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: He was acting, watching, speaking with that excited narrow consciousness which reminds one of an animal with fierce eyes and retractile claws.

feels.name: Shame
feels.quote: Lydgate felt shame, but could not bear to act as if he felt it, by refusing to see Mr. Farebrother.

feels.name: Shock
feels.quote: Fred felt a shock greater than he could quite account for by the vague knowledge that Lydgate was in debt.

feels.name: Alarm
feels.quote: Fred was moved quite newly. Some one highly susceptible to the contemplation of a fine act has said, that it produces a sort of regenerating shudder through the frame, and makes one feel ready to begin a new life.

Places.name: Green_Dragon_billiardroom
Places.description: A constant resort for a certain set, most of whom were regarded as men of pleasure.

Places.name: St_Botolphs_road
Places.description: A patch of green where the road diverged towards St. Botolph’s.
